txt.en: 'The door has been opened. Venture through it to the south and the Huntsman's Hall. Speak with whomever you find on the other side. I wish you luck and hope the journey is fruitful.'
'You may find your time here to be short and unpleasant, intruder.'
The entrance to the court of the Wild Hunstman has been opened and is waiting for you to explore within.

The Huntsman's Hall is in the south of the Mournshaws. It can be entered through Tûm's portal or by crossing the river to the south.\n\nTûm asked you to venture to the Huntsman's Hall and speak with those within.
